name: Postgres
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system with over 35 years of active development that has earned it a strong reputation for reliability, feature robustness, and performance.

environment-variables.name: REPLICA_POSTGRES_USER
environment-variables.description: Postgres specific user for handling replication

environment-variables.name: REPLICA_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
environment-variables.description: password for specific Postgres user for handling replication

environment-variables.name: PGDATA
environment-variables.description: path into container used for store postgres data

environment-variables.name: HOST_BIND_PG_VOLUME
environment-variables.description: Folder into host for bind-mounting pgdata

environment-variables.name: HOST_BIND_PG_BACKUP
environment-variables.description: Folder into host for bind-mounting backup folder
